inputs: What we store and why
outputs: Not an ACP

inputs: The HotCRP.com service handles the submission and review of artifacts, such as scientific and engineering publications.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com service; action: handle; resource: submission; condition: none; purpose: none | decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com service; action: handle; resource: review; condition: none; purpose: none}

inputs: In most cases, The HotCRP.com service does not own the data you provide.
outputs: {decision:  deny; subject: hotcrp.com; action: own; resource: data you provide; purpose: none; condition: none}

inputs: Rather, The HotCRP.com service broker the data you provide on behalf of scholarly societies, such as ACM and USENIX; on behalf of conference review boards; and on behalf of other site managers.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com service; action: broker; resource: data you provide; condition: none; purpose: on behalf of scholarly societies | decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com service; action: broker; resource: data you provide; condition: none; purpose: on behalf of conference review boards | decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com service; action: broker; resource: data you provide; condition: none; purpose: on behalf of other site managers}

inputs: The HotCRP.com service store Submission artifacts, including submissions (such as PDFs), metadata (such as titles and author lists), and supplementary information (such as topics and other uploaded files).
outputs: Not an ACP

inputs: The HotCRP.com service store Review artifacts, including reviews, discussions, and associated uploaded files.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com service; action: store; resource: review artifacts; purpose: none; condition: none}

inputs: The HotCRP.com service store Configuration settings used by site managers to configure a site.
outputs: Not an ACP

inputs: The HotCRP.com service store Profile data, such as user names, affiliations, email addresses, topic interests, and review preferences.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com service; action: store; resource: profile data; purpose: none; condition: none}

inputs: The HotCRP.com service store Demographic data, such as user gender identity and approximate age.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com service; action: store; resource: demographic data; purpose: none; condition: none}

inputs: The HotCRP.com service store Browsing data, such as logs of which sites a computer has accessed.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com service store; action: store; resource: browsing data; purpose: none; condition: none}

inputs: Controlling your information
outputs: Not an ACP

inputs: Submission and review artifacts: When you submit artifacts to a HotCRP.com site, you give a HotCRP.com site managers (e.g., the program chairs) permission to store and view artifacts indefinitely.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com site managers; action: store; resource: artifacts; purpose: none; condition: none | decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com site managers; action: view; resource: artifacts; purpose: none; condition: none}

inputs: You give that site’s managers (e.g., the program chairs permission to distribute artifacts at that site’s managers (e.g., the program chairs discretion, for review or other purposes.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: site’s managers; action: distribute; resource: artifacts; purpose: review; condition: none | decision: allow; subject: site’s managers; action: distribute; resource: artifacts; purpose: other purposes; condition: none}

inputs: Finally, you give a HotCRP.com site permission to process artifacts and to store artifacts indefinitely.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com site; action: process; resource: artifacts; purpose: none; condition: none | decision: allow; subject: hotcrp.com site; action: store; resource: artifacts; purpose: none; condition: none}

inputs: Site managers control who can access artifacts, and a HotCRP.com site doesn’t share artifacts except as site managers allow.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: site managers; action: control; resource: who can access artifacts; purpose: none; condition: none | decision: deny; subject: hotcrp.com site; action: share; resource: artifacts; purpose: none; condition: site managers allow}

inputs: However, a HotCRP.com site may publicize aggregate information that cannot be traced to any site or user, such as total submission counts across all sites.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com site; action: publicize; resource: aggregate information; condition: none; purpose: none}

inputs: If an artifact was submitted in error, you can request an artifact permanent deletion.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: you; action: request; resource: artifact permanent deletion; purpose: none; condition: artifact was submitted in error}

inputs: Such requests should be directed to that site’s managers (e.g., the program chairs ).
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: none; action: direct; resource: requests; condition: none; purpose: none}

inputs: Configuration settings are stored by HotCRP.com indefinitely.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: hotcrp.com; action: store; resource: configuration settings; condition: none; purpose: none}

inputs: Site managers may request the deletion of a HotCRP.com site, if allowed by Site managers site agreements with HotCRP.com.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: site managers; action: request; resource: deletion of a hotcrp.com site; purpose: none; condition: site managers site agreements with hotcrp.com}

inputs: request will delete all associated site data, including submission and review artifacts.
outputs: {decision:  allow; subject: request; action: delete; resource: all associated site data; purpose: none; condition: none | decision: allow; subject: request; action: delete; resource: submission and review artifacts; purpose: none; condition: none}
